projects.name: USpiri.com
projects.description: Tri-web project, featuring three interconected projects. The portfolio, developed using angular 17 with Tailwind and Server-Side Rendering (SSR), dynamically loading the latest blog posts and personal information. The blog, powered by Astro, repository for my programming articles, offering a source of knowledge. Last, the CV, providing a printable PDF version, housing information embedded in the portfolio.

projects.name: Raices Nativas
projects.description: Raíces Nativas is an exciting project in collaboration with biology students from the National University of Córdoba (UNC) to promote actively the conservation of native plant species from Córdoba, Argentina.

projects.name: Devly CLI
projects.description: Devly CLI is an ongoing Rust-based project that assists in development process, providing valuable support for the implementation of Conventional Commits standards. Currently I use this application daily.

projects.name: Todo CLI
projects.description: An efficient command-line program crafted in Rust, dedicated to local task management.

projects.name: Sticky Notes
projects.description: Sticky Notes represents one of my initial projects developed using Angular, offering a user-friendly notes management system that facilitates organization through tables and boards.
